attributes.action: make significent reductions in Council Tax and Water Rates (e.g. 10 -20%) payable in respect of homes on housing developments of more than 10 houses on unadopted roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council Tax is used to provide local services.

Although residents benefit from services outside the immediate area of their homes,some services are not provided on unadopted roads (e.g. maintenance of roads, litter collection, emergency repairs to sewers and street lighting; and landscape maintenance). Residents therefore have to rely on the developers to undertake such work, which can take a long while, and standards can vary considerably in quality.

Council tax should be proportionate to the levels and standards of service provided by the local and water authorities.

Residents selling homes on unadopted roads may be required to deposit considerable sums of money as a bond to cover repairs etc. to unadopted roads. This undermines the value of homes and could be considered an additional tax.
